cont.entity_a: Only one cord retracts, which is less convenient than models with both wires retracting.
cont.entity_b: Cord is too short for desk movement.

cont.entity_a: Clip-on attachments are secure and comfortable.
cont.entity_b: Small ear holes, causing discomfort. Bright sound with hard clamp causing discomfort.

cont.entity_a: Clearer and louder sound with prominent treble and weak bass. Occasional background white noise. Bass response is lacking. Fit around the ear is too loose, affecting sound quality.
cont.entity_b: Crisp and clean sound. Balanced high and mid-range with weak lows. No kick in bass and distortion at max volume. Good and clear sound with decent bass.
Especially on sale. Not comparable to Bose in quality but decent for price.

cont.entity_a: Thin cables may affect long-term durability. Worked well for two months before stopping unexpectedly.
cont.entity_b: Subpar build quality with weak plastic. Plastic broke within six months.

cont.entity_a: Actual design is white plastic, not clear as expected.
Keeps ears warm during workouts. Earpieces pinch after prolonged wear.
cont.entity_b: Comfortable with good sound for portable use.
Good for immersing in music at home or office.
